import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-game-grid', templateUrl: './game-grid.component.html', styleUrls: ['./game-grid.component.css'] }) export class GameGridComponent { title = 'Minefield' colArray: number[] = []; rowArray = []; columns = 4; rows = 10; setDimension() { this.colArray = []; this.rowArray = []; for (let i = 0; this.columns; i++) { this.colArray.push(i); } for (let i = 0; this.rows; i++) { this.rowArray.push(i); } } }
